channel.title: CVE Feed for WPVibes -- Elementor Addon Elements
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPVibes -- Elementor Addon Elements

item.title: CVE-2024-30422|2024-03-28T09:03:35.902Z -- wpvibes -- elementor%20addon%20elements
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPVibes Elementor Addon Elements allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Elementor Addon Elements: from n/a through 1.13.1.
